= VSCode =

== Keybinds ==
vim escape shortcut:
{{{
"vim.insertModeKeyBindings": [
  {
    "before": ["j", "j"],
    "after": ["<Esc>"]
  }
]
}}}

* Keep file open in editor: <Ctrl> K + <Enter>
* Demonstrates keybinds for navigating windows effectively
  * https://blog.logrocket.com/learn-these-keyboard-shortcuts-to-become-a-vs-code-ninja/
